name: Flying People
description:
Requires Java. Install a Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to get Java.

Run runme.bat (Windows) or runme.sh (Mac/Linux) or just start flyingpeople.jar

Arrow keys move, Z to special (except for bullet ship), X to fire (can hold down).

Game ends after third boss.

Level files can be modified with a text editor. Press F5 in game to generate and load a random level.
